Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:zoomtowidth(SCREEN_WIDTH) self:zoomtoheight(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.1)
fd_sf_bgd = self; end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT) self:zoomtowidth(SCREEN_WIDTH) self:zoomtoheight(SCREEN_HEIGHT) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,.1,0) self:effectclock('bgm') self:effectoffset(4) self:effectperiod(8) self:blend('add') fd_sf_bgs = self; end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/512) self:basezoomy(SCREEN_HEIGHT/2048) fd_sf_wave1 = self; self:croptop(.05) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,5,0) self:effectoffset(.5) self:customtexturerect(0,0,8,1); self:texcoordvelocity(-.5,0); end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/512) self:basezoomy(SCREEN_HEIGHT/2048) fd_sf_wave2 = self; self:croptop(.05) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,5,0) self:customtexturerect(0,0,8,1); self:texcoordvelocity(.5,0); end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/512) self:basezoomy(SCREEN_HEIGHT/2048) fd_sf_wave3 = self; self:croptop(.05) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,5,0) self:effectoffset(.5) self:customtexturerect(0,0,8,1); self:texcoordvelocity(-.5,0); end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/512) self:basezoomy(SCREEN_HEIGHT/2048) fd_sf_wave4 = self; self:croptop(.05) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,5,0) self:customtexturerect(0,0,8,1); self:texcoordvelocity(.5,0); end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/512) self:basezoomy(SCREEN_HEIGHT/2048) fd_sf_wave5 = self; self:croptop(.05) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,5,0) self:effectoffset(.5) self:customtexturerect(0,0,8,1); self:texcoordvelocity(-.5,0); end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/512) self:basezoomy(SCREEN_HEIGHT/2048) fd_sf_wave6 = self; self:croptop(.05) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,5,0) self:customtexturerect(0,0,8,1); self:texcoordvelocity(.5,0); end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/512) self:basezoomy(SCREEN_HEIGHT/2048) fd_sf_wave7 = self; self:croptop(.05) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,5,0) self:effectoffset(.5) self:customtexturerect(0,0,8,1); self:texcoordvelocity(-.5,0); end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/512) self:basezoomy(SCREEN_HEIGHT/2048) fd_sf_wave8 = self; self:croptop(.05) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,5,0) self:customtexturerect(0,0,8,1); self:texcoordvelocity(.5,0); end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/512) self:basezoomy(SCREEN_HEIGHT/2048) fd_sf_wave9 = self; self:croptop(.05) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,5,0) self:effectoffset(.5) self:customtexturerect(0,0,8,1); self:texcoordvelocity(-.5,0); self:fadebottom(.2) end

%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:basezoomx(SCREEN_WIDTH/512) self:basezoomy(SCREEN_HEIGHT/2048) fd_sf_wave10 = self; self:croptop(.05) self:bob() self:effectmagnitude(0,5,0) self:customtexturerect(0,0,8,1); self:texcoordvelocity(.5,0); self:fadebottom(.2) end
%function(self) self:hidden(0) self:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) self:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) self:zoomtowidth(SCREEN_WIDTH) self:zoomtoheight(SCREEN_HEIGHT) fd_sf_bgb = self; self:queuecommand('Update') end
